thread.title: Author to speak about 'Travels through the heart and soul of New England' at Boyden Library
thread.title_full: Author to speak about 'Travels through the heart and soul of New England' at Boyden Library

author: Kathy Harney Boyden Library
title: Author to speak about 'Travels through the heart and soul of New England' at Boyden Library
text:
Join us at 7 p.m. on Thursday, Sept. 18, as Ted Reinstein speaks about his book Travels through the Heart and Soul of New England: Stories of Struggle, Resilience, and Triumph.
Ted condenses his countless travels into a single, unique labor of love: a journey through the heart and soul of New England, meeting the most memorable people — and their unlikely stories — all along the way.
